page.title: 12LONGHOPE:EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {Richard Read Haulage} His father started the business in {1913}hauling cement from{Mitcheldean. At one time he had 87 lorries this has now been reduced to 25. They now employ 28 drivers and 14 fitters with an outside repair business started in 1970. They have an agency for E.R.F. trucks. During the{miners strike}they were employed to take coal from the mines, they had up to 10 lorries on this job. They had a lot of trouble with the striking miners with broken windows and attacks on lorries. He took the miners union to court for this and was awarded{Â£50,000 damages. They have delivered animal feed to the Middle East,Baghdad and Pakistan. Now they sometimes deliver goods to France,Germany and Belgium.
